attributes.action: Nationalise all banks, who have had Government support, but do not offer mortgage rates determined by the Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was borrowing at 0.39% above the BOE base rate, but now pay 2.39%.Banks that think they are in business to make profits on the back of tax payers money should be taken over by the people for the people. In the profit and loss equation the banks made huge profits and the people huge losses

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
